author: Buying Business Travel
title: British Airways cancels Almaty route
text:
British Airways cancels Almaty route 0 comments Follow @thomasnewcombe 
British Airways has announced it will cancel its London Heathrow to Almaty route in October. 
The airline will operate the final Boeing 767-300ER service on October 11 when it departs London Heathrow, returning the next day, reports airlineroute.net 
BA is also cancelling its service to Entebbe on Africa with the final flight operating on October 2. 
Earlier this year , BA announced its new winter routes from Heathrow, with services to Reykjavik and Salzburg.
